Translations.Text: Kuma a lokacin da aka buga misali da ¦an Maryama, sai ga mutanenka daga gare shi (shi misalin) suna dariya da izgili
Kuma suka ce: "Shin, gumakanmu ne mafifita ko shi (¦an Maryama)?" Ba su buga wannan misali ba a gare ka face domin yin jidali.* A'a, su mutane nemasu husuma
Shi (¦an Maryama) bai zama ba face wani bawa ne, Mun yi ni'ima a gare shi, kuma Muka sanya shi abin koyi ga Bani Isra'ila
Kuma da Muna so lalle ne da Mun sanya mala'iku, daga ci, kinku, a cikin ƙasa, suna mayewa
Kuma lalle shi, haƙiƙa, wani ilmi ne na Sa'a, saboda haka, kada ku yi shakka a gare ta, kuma ku bi Ni. Wannan ita ce hanya madaidaiciya
Kuma kada Shaiɗan ya taushe ku (daga hanyar). Lalle shi maƙiyi ne a gare ku, mai bayyanawar ƙiyayya

Kuma a lokacin da Isa ya je da hujjoji bayyanannu, ya ce: "Lalle ne na zo muku da hikima kuma domin in bayyana muku, sashen abin da kuke saɓa wa juna acikinsa, saboda haka ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma ku yi mini ɗa'a
Lalle ne, Allah Shi ne Ubangijina kuma Shi ne Ubangijinku saboda haka ku bauta Masa. Wannan ita ce hanya madaidaiciya
Sai ƙungiyoyi *suka saɓa a tsakaninsu. To, bone ya tabbata ga waɗanda suka yi zalunci daga azabar yini mai raɗaɗi
Shin suna jiran wani abu ne? sai dai Sa'a ta je musu bisaga abke, alhali kuwa ba su sani ba
Masoya a yinin nan, sashensu zuwa ga sashe maƙiya ne, face masu taƙawa (su kam masu son juna ne)
